item.title: Spotted people flytipping. Have a video of them doing it and going back into their house, 14th June
item.description:
We've witnessed rubbish put outside of someone else's house close to a dog bin. Location: side of 77 Darrell Road SE22 9NJ.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Darrell Road, East Dulwich, London

item.title: Private Gate blocking PROW, 14th June
item.description:
Someone has fitted a private gate with a lock across the public right of way behind 80 Durban Road, without consulting any of the residents. Is this allowed? Or can this be removed?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Durban Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loud music and fire smoke, 14th June
item.description:
Going on for 2 hours -loud speaker music and open BBQ fire

item.title: Fly-tipped waste is blocking access to the bin storage area at Saffron Close., 14th June
item.description:
Several household items — including a bed frame, a car seat, and a washing rail — have been dumped by the communal bin area at Saffron Close. As a result, the binmen have had to move the bins out onto the pavement, as there is no space and the area is blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saffron Close, Temple Fortune, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture dumped by landlord of 5 Bewick Mews, 14th June
item.description:
Landlord of 5 Bewick Mews dumped his previous tenant’s furniture and has ignored requests from neighbours to clear it. It’s been there for several weeks (the tenant moved out in November last year)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bewick Mews, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked blocking pavement, 14th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Slades Gardens, London

item.title: Ref 6561458, 14th June
item.description:
Reported 7th Oct 24 no action to sort issue. Virgin media put a cover over broken manhole and left it, this has now been going on for sometime with no action. I have replaced the temporary cover on many occasions due to it ending up down the road, someone will fall or have a serious accident at some point. You have been notified twice now, if there is an accident I will be happy to provide this information to the injured party to make sure claim against the council .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Heath Road, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown weeds on public footpath, intruding on private fencing, 14th June
item.description:
There is a public footpath that has massive overgrown weeds which is now wrapping around and destroying fences of private property. It now means the path to private gardens is impassable. It has been an ongoing issue for the past year. It is the public footpath in between Lyham Road and Doverfield Road, access is next to 32 Doverfield Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Doverfield Road, Streatham Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
